channel.title: Need Help with MySQL
channel.description:
Well I am trying to add the highscores and I get this keeps popping up on my cmd thingy
java.lang.NullPointerException at highscore.destroyCon(highscore.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:12079) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:390) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:382) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:336) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: Need Help with MySQL

It is having trouble destroying the connection when a player logs out. In which parts of your server did you establish the connection?
